javascript-front:
1<div id="searchbox"></div>
2<div id="refinement"></div>
3<div id="hits"></div>
4
5<script>
6const {
7  searchBox,
8  hits
9} = instantsearch.widgets;
10
11search.addWidgets([
12  searchBox({
13    container: "#searchbox"
14  }),
15  hits({
16    container: "#hits"
17  }),
18  refinementList({
19    container: "#refinement",
20    attribute: "company"
21  }),
22]);
23
24search.start();
25</script>
